text: Ignacio Prieto Urrejola (born September 23, 1943 in Santiago, Chile) is a former Chilean footballer who played for 5 clubs and in the Chile national football team in the FIFA World Cup England 1966.Profile at FIFA.com Soccerama 01, pp3-32 ==Teams (Player)== * Universidad Católica 1962-1967 * Nacional 1968-1971 * Lille 1971-1976 * Stade Lavallois 1976-1977 * Universidad Católica 1977-1979 ==Teams (Coach)== * Universidad Católica 1983-1989 * Cruz Azul 1991-1992 * Universidad Católica 1992-1993 * Colo-Colo 1994 ==Titles (Player)== * Universidad Católica 1966 (Chilean Championship) * Nacional 1969, 1970, and 1971 (Uruguayan Championship) * Nacional 1971 (Copa Libertadores and Intercontinental Cup) ==Titles (Coach)== * Universidad Católica 1983 (Copa Chile and Repúblic Cup), 1984 and 1987 (Chilean Championship) * Colo-Colo 1994 (Copa Chile) ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Chilean football managers Category:Cruz Azul managers Category:Chile international footballers Category:Club Deportivo Universidad Católica footballers Category:Club Nacional de Football players Category:Expatriate footballers in France Category:Expatriate footballers in Uruguay Category:1966 FIFA World Cup players Category:1967 South American Championship players Category:Colo-Colo managers Category:Association football defenders
title: Ignacio Prieto
